guide.conclusion: This project first appeared in CRAFT Volume 03, page 143.

guide.introduction: Looking for some punk-rock glam that shows off the creative crafter inside? Fishing lure earrings may be the perfect cure. Lots of inspiration can come from a tackle shop. People like shiny, colorful things, and they hope fish do, too.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Looking for some punk-rock glam that shows off the creative crafter inside? Fishing lure earrings may be the perfect cure. Lots of inspiration can come from a tackle shop. People like shiny, colorful things, and they hope fish do, too.

Relevant parts
  • Fishing lure
  • Earring posts
Tools
  • Pliers
  • Wire cutters

lines.text: Carefully cut off the hook at its “eye” with the wire cutters, Watch out for those gnarly, three-pronged trouble hooks!
lines.text_raw: Carefully cut off the hook at its “eye” with the wire cutters, Watch out for those gnarly, three-pronged trouble hooks!

lines.text: Using your needlenose pliers, open the loop on the earring post. Slide the loop of the earring through the eye of the fishing lure, and close the loop.
lines.text_raw: Using your needlenose pliers, open the loop on the earring post. Slide the loop of the earring through the eye of the fishing lure, and close the loop.

lines.text: Add additional baubles (sinkers, anyone?) to taste.
lines.text_raw: Add additional baubles (sinkers, anyone?) to taste.

lines.text: Wow. That was quick. Rinse and repeat.
lines.text_raw: Wow. That was quick. Rinse and repeat.

guide.summary: People like shiny, colorful things, too!
guide.title: Punk Rock Fishing Lure Earrings
